assetProfile.address2: Free zone Future Area Kuwait Free Trade Zone, Shuwaikh
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Automated Systems Company - KPSC provides IT infrastructure and software solutions in Kuwait and internationally. Its Services and Solutions segment engages in consulting, implementing, upgrading, and managing applications in the areas of enterprise resource planning and customer relationship management; and managing projects and human capital outsourcing, as well as sells software. The company's Investments segment invests in local equity funds and shares, as well as funds managed by portfolio managers. Its Training Services segment offers training services under the franchise agreement with the franchisor. The company's IT infrastructure solutions comprise data center infrastructure, network infrastructure, and cyber security, as well as provides professional services, including project implementation, solution architecture and design, and on demand support and annual maintenance contract services. Its software solutions comprise infrastructure and engineering software solutions, as well as student and learning management systems. The company also offers healthcare information system solutions comprising PANMEDICA, a solution for medium and large size hospitals with inpatient facilities; PANLAB, a system that handles the issue of maintenance and printing of various lab reports; PANPHARMA, a system for pharmacies; and PANCLINICA, a system for polyclinics and medical centers, as well as trades in automation equipment and secondment of staff. The company provides IT services and solutions to government/semi-government, healthcare, education, banking and finance, oil and gas, telecom, and construction industries, as well as retail and logistics, and travel industries. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Kuwait City, Kuwait. Automated Systems Company - KPSC is a subsidiary of Kuwait Airways Company K.S.C.
